PerfectNetExp.abs: 有出版价值的printable有触手的tentacular-

list.abs: ...可以捕食,能缩人触腕囊内,各腕的内侧均具4行带柄的吸盘,触腕只在末端舌状部内侧有10行小吸盘,此称触腕穗,tentacular club,雄性左侧第4腕的中间吸盘退化,特化为生殖腕或称茎化腕,hectocotylized arms,可输.
刺袋 spinous pocket围口触手 tentacular cirrus-
tentacle bearing ridge 总担tentacular plane 触手面tentaculocyst 触手囊
...左右对称排列,背部正中央为第一对,向腹侧依次为2一5对,其中第4对腕特别长,末端膨大呈舌状,称为触腕,tentacular arm,可以捕食,能缩人触腕囊内,各腕的内侧均具4行带柄的吸盘,触腕只在末端舌状部内侧有10行小吸盘,此称.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or resembling tentacles

auth_sentence.content: It looks like a bunch of squiggles until the eye discerns a series of tentacular fingers coiled around a doughnut-shaped tube.
auth_sentence.res_content: It looks like a bunch of squiggles until the eye discerns a series of tentacular fingers coiled around a doughnut-shaped tube.
